nodes.text: Somebody was serious about keeping this chest in one piece. It's got metal bands holding it together. It also has a sophisticated lock on it.
And no wonder! 25 lyra and all that other stuff... that's a really nice haul!
There must be some good loot in it!
I can't believe they did all that just for some sleeping powders, though.
But... just some sleeping powders and a knife?
There's a trap on the lock!
It would be nice to know whether this chest is trapped. I guess I should work on my observation skills.
Ah, it's still unlocked.
It's a Wolfe class lock in fine condition. Very tricky and sophisticated.
Looks like a really tricky lock.
There's a trap on it!
I don't need any chests. I just need what's in 'em.
I really need to get a Trap Tapper.
That should do it.
Ouch! I didn't see that poisoned needle!
Now my hand burns like I touched a live ember.
This one is tricky... gotta focus!
Yes! I got it!
Noooooo! Stupid chest.
I've got to be much better at picking locks if I want to get this chest open.
Of course, it's locked.
Okay, let's see what's hidden away in this stout chest.
Ouch! I didn't see that poisoned needle!
It burns and my fingers are starting to turn a greenish color.
Some really nice stuff in this chest...
Ha-ha, sea chest, have you any loot? Yes sir, it's true, three bags full! Full of sleeping powder, that is!
This knife has a great balance and a really sharp point.
And it looks like 25 coins to add to my purse... I'm not rich yet, but I'm getting there a Lyra at a time.
I've emptied it completely.
But I got something worthwhile out of it.
